Name: New Orleans Buck
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring ginger beer.
Review: Agricole character bursts out of this refreshing ginger-spiced cocktail.
History: Created in 2008 by Jonny Raglin at Absinthe in San Francisco, USA. A ' Buck ' is any cocktail with a spirit + lime + ginger beer or ginger ale.
Nutrition: One serving of New Orleans Buck contains 171 calories
